question: Are men allowed to shave their legs, chest and back?
answer:
QUESTION
Are men allowed to shave their legs, chest and back?
ANSWER


Share:

In the Name of Allah, the Most Gracious, the Most Merciful.

As-salāmu ῾alaykum wa-rahmatullāhi wa-barakātuh. 

It is permissible for men to shave the hair of the legs, chest and back. However, it is undesirable to do so.[1]  

And Allah Ta῾āla Knows Best

Mufti Zaid M Shelia,
Student Darul Iftaa
Chicago, Illinois (USA)

Checked and Approved by,
Mufti Ebrahim Desai.
www.daruliftaa.net   




[1]  وفي حلق شعر الصدر والظهر ترك الأدب كذا في القنية اهـ..( رد المحتار على الدر المختار  6 /407 دار الفكربيروت)
